'''Holiday Update''' is a name given to different ''Minecraft'' updates.

== ''Java Edition'' ==
* [[Java Edition 1.15]], the [[Buzzy Bees]] update, released on December 10, 2019, was called a "Holiday update" in an article.<ref name="Buzzy Bees">{{Mcnet|buzzy-bees|Buzzy Bees|December 4, 2019|Kelsey Howard}}</ref>
* [[Java Edition 1.21.4]], [[The Garden Awakens]] drop, released on December 3, 2024, was internally called a holiday drop/update.<ref name="survey">{{cite|url=https://survey.alchemer.com/s3/8003210/Minecraft-Live-Survey-2024|title=Minecraft Live Survey 2024}}</ref><ref name="twitter survey link">{{Tweet|Minecraft|1840816372349353985|Got thoughts on #MinecraftLIVE? We want to know! Take the survey now and let us know what you think: https://aka.ms/MCL24Survey|September 30, 2024}}</ref><ref name="mcnet garden awakens">{{mcnet|test-eyeblossom-and-resin|Test eyeblossom and resin|October 23, 2024|Sophie Austin}}</ref><ref name="mcnet garden awakens image">https://www.minecraft.net/content/dam/minecraftnet/games/minecraft/screenshots/mcv_holiday_eyeblossom-resin_testing_header_1280x768.jpg</ref>
* [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], the [[Mounts of Mayhem]] drop, released on December 9, 2025, was internally called a holiday drop.<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/content/dam/minecraftnet/games/minecraft/marketplace/MCV_LIVE_holiday2025_editorial_1170x500.jpg</ref>
